name: Kuroyami Kurausu: Night of Vengence
description:
A short project we did for our CMPM80K class using Construct 3. We would love to know what you think about it.

The music was used with permission from Virus610 at Project610.com. The song featured in the game is listed as song21_02.

The controls are z to dash and x to slash. Arrow keys are used for movement

The dash will damage enemies and slash will reflect projectiles

You probably want to play in fullscreen.
